Title: Cracklefang
Description:
Hi! So, I have a dilemma. I've only got one good wolf name.... wait for it... Cracklefang! I know, amazing right?! But now there are TWO big nasty wolves in the forest, which is all kinds of confusing.

I need you to kill one of them so I can free up the name. Should be simple enough, yeah? Especially for someone of your incredibleness.

So, are you on board? I'm hoping for yes!
